tools.title: Google Authenticator
tools.description: A widely used 2FA app for securing Google accounts and many others

tools.title: NordVPN
tools.description: One of the best VPN services available for privacy and security.

tools.title: ProtonMail
tools.description: An email service with a focus on privacy, encryption, security.

tools.title: Dashlane
tools.description: A secure password manager with integrated 2FA features.

tools.title: YubiKey
tools.description: A hardware-based 2FA device that enhances security for your accounts.

tools.title: Microsoft Mobile Authenticator
tools.description: A commonly used 2FA for securing online media accounts.

tools.title: BeenVerified
tools.description: Allows you to remove your information from People Search Results.

tools.title: Have I Been Pwned?
tools.description: Allows you to search across multiple data breaches to see any compromise.

tools.title: GrapheneOS Auditor
tools.description: A security tool that verifies the integrity of Android devices.

tools.title: BrowserLeaks.com
tools.description: Provides detailed insights into what personal data your browser leaks.
